name: Disco Destruction
description: Be the DJ. Keep the customers dancing. Make some money. And save the disco from destruction.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 500 MB available space
